isSpecFlowProject.description: Enables the project to be handled as SpecFlow project. (Default: [detect automatically])

generatorFolder.description: The path of the SpecFlow generator folder used by the project, that is usually the 'tools' folder of the SpecFlow NuGet package, e.g. '..\MyDependencies\SpecFlow.2.3.0\tools'. (Default: [detect from the installed SpecFlow NuGet package])

configFilePath.description: The path of the SpecFlow configuration file (App.config or specflow.json) used by the project, e.g. 'specflow.json'. (Default: [detect config file automatically])

version.description: The SpecFlow version used by the project, e.g. '2.3.1'. (Default: [detect version automatically])

traits.description: The list of the SpecFlow-related project traits. The possible traits are: 'MsBuildGeneration', 'XUnitAdapter', 'DesignTimeFeatureFileGeneration', e.g. '["XUnitAdapter"]'. (Default: [detect from the installed NuGet packages])

Traceability.description: Settings for traceability of scenarios, see http://speclink.me/deveroomtraceability for details.

tagLinks.description: List of tags patterns that should be converted to an external URL

tagPattern.description: A regular expression that matches to the tag name (without leading '@' sign). The identifier of the artifacts should be matched with a named regex group. E.g. 'issue\\:(?<id>\\d+)'.

urlTemplate.description: An URL template to generate the external link. It can contain parameters in an '{paramName}' format, where 'paramName' refers to the regular expression group name in the 'tagPattern'. E.g. 'https://github.com/me/my-project/issues/{id}'
